item.title: Bringing Light, Air, and Life Into the Build
item.description: Today’s milestone is all about openings—literally. Installing the windows transforms the project from a framed structure into a space that finally feels like a home. From careful measurements to that satisfying final fit, this step brings in the light and sets the stage for everything that comes next.

media:content.media:title: Bringing Light, Air, and Life Into the Build
media:content.media:description: Today’s milestone is all about openings—literally. Installing the windows transforms the project from a framed structure into a space that finally feels like a home. From careful measurements to that satisfying final fit, this step brings in the light and sets the stage for everything that comes next.

item.title: Heavy Stone, Tight Spaces, and Zero Room for Mistakes
item.description: Granite day always brings a mix of excitement and nerves. With tight measurements, heavy slabs, and no second chances, every move counts. In this video, we walk through the full install and find out whether everything lines up the way it should—or if we’re in for a surprise.

media:content.media:title: Heavy Stone, Tight Spaces, and Zero Room for Mistakes
media:content.media:description: Granite day always brings a mix of excitement and nerves. With tight measurements, heavy slabs, and no second chances, every move counts. In this video, we walk through the full install and find out whether everything lines up the way it should—or if we’re in for a surprise.

item.title: The Foundation Takes Shape
item.description: In this episode, the mountain home build hits a major milestone as concrete day finally arrives. From prepping the forms to watching the first pour roll in, this chapter captures the excitement, the teamwork, and the satisfying moment when all the planning starts turning into something solid. The project is officially rising from the ground.

item.title: A Sneak Peek at Something Seriously Different
item.description: Get an early look at a pair of upcoming work boots that break all the rules—starting with a sole made from anything but rubber. T
